Class Heros

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.backpackhero.entites.Heros
public final class Heros extends Object
The player character class. Manages stats, inventory, combat actions, status effects, and level progression.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Heros()
    Constructs a new Hero with base starting statistics (40 HP, 3 Energy, Lvl 1).

  • Constructor Details

    • Heros

      public Heros()
      Constructs a new Hero with base starting statistics (40 HP, 3 Energy, Lvl 1).

  • Method Details

    • debuterTourCombat

      public void debuterTourCombat()
      Resets energy and protection at the beginning of the combat turn. Also calculates and applies passive protection from Armor items in the backpack.

    • recevoirDegats

      public void recevoirDegats(int damage)
      Inflicts damage on the hero. Handles damage absorption from Protection and the evasion logic from the Dodge status.
      Parameters:
      damage - The amount of damage to inflict.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the damage amount is negative.

    • ajouterProtection

      public void ajouterProtection(int amount)
      Adds protection (block) to the hero.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of protection to add.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the amount is negative.

    • soigner

      public void soigner(int amount)
      Heals the hero, restoring HP up to the maximum HP cap.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of HP to restore.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the amount is negative.

    • depenserEnergie

      public boolean depenserEnergie(int cost)
      Tries to spend energy.
      Parameters:
      cost - The energy cost.
      Returns:
      true if the energy was spent successfully, false if insufficient.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the cost is negative.

    • estVivant

      public boolean estVivant()
      Checks if the hero is alive (HP > 0).
      Returns:
      true if the hero is alive.

    • getBackpack

      public BackPack getBackpack()
      Gets the hero's backpack.
      Returns:
      The BackPack instance.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • gainXp

      public void gainXp(int amount)
      Grants experience points to the hero. Triggers a level up if the XP threshold is met.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of XP gained.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the amount is negative.

    • addStatus

      public void addStatus(Effect effect, int amount)
      Adds X stacks of a specific status effect to the hero.
      Parameters:
      effect - The status effect to add.
      amount - The number of stacks to add.

    • calculateDamageOutput

      public int calculateDamageOutput(int baseDamage)
      Calculates the actual damage output of an item based on status effects (Rage/Weak).
      Parameters:
      baseDamage - The base damage stat of the item.
      Returns:
      The final damage output.

    • calculateBlockOutput

      public int calculateBlockOutput(int baseBlock)
      Calculates the actual block output of an item based on status effects (Haste/Slow).
      Parameters:
      baseBlock - The base block stat of the item.
      Returns:
      The final block output.

    • triggerStartTurnEffects

      public void triggerStartTurnEffects()
      Triggers effects that occur at the START of the hero's turn. Handles Effect.REGEN and Effect.BURN.

    • triggerEndTurnEffects

      public void triggerEndTurnEffects()
      Triggers effects that occur at the END of the hero's turn. Handles Effect.POISON and the general degradation of status stacks.

    • getGold

      public int getGold()
      Gets the amount of gold the hero currently possesses.
      Returns:
      The current gold amount.

    • gagnerOr

      public void gagnerOr(int montant)
      Adds gold to the hero's possession (stored in the backpack).
      Parameters:
      montant - The amount of gold to add.

    • payer

      public boolean payer(int montant)
      Tries to pay a required amount of gold.
      Parameters:
      montant - The amount to pay.
      Returns:
      true if the payment was successful, false otherwise (insufficient funds).

    • getPv

      public int getPv()
      Gets the current health points.
      Returns:
      Current HP.

    • getPvMax

      public int getPvMax()
      Gets the maximum health points.
      Returns:
      Max HP.

    • getLevel

      public int getLevel()
      Gets the current level.
      Returns:
      Current level.

    • getProtection

      public int getProtection()
      Gets the current protection (block) amount.
      Returns:
      Current protection.

    • getEnergie

      public int getEnergie()
      Gets the current energy available.
      Returns:
      Current energy.

    • refuseCurseImmediate

      public void refuseCurseImmediate()
      Applies the self-damage penalty for refusing a forced curse immediately. The damage is cumulative (increases with each consecutive refusal).

    • acceptCurseImmediate

      public void acceptCurseImmediate()
      Handles the consequence of immediately accepting a forced curse. Resets the consecutive refusal damage counter.

    • applyCurseRemovalPenalty

      public void applyCurseRemovalPenalty()
      Applies the temporary Max HP penalty when a curse is removed by other means (e.g., in town). Sets the penalty duration (2 combats).

    • decrementCursePenaltyDuration

      public void decrementCursePenaltyDuration()
      Decrements the duration of the curse removal penalty. Restores Max HP when the duration reaches zero.
